books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: The Los Angeles detective Harry Bosch and his new partner investigate two long-unsolved cases.
books.name: THE BURNING ROOM

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A downsized Wall Street lawyer joins a legal clinic in a small Virginia town, and becomes involved both in real people’s lives and in litigation against the coal mining industry.
books.name: GRAY MOUNTAIN

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: In County Mayo, evil and witchcraft complicate a long-simmering romance; Book 3 of the Cousins O’Dwyer trilogy.
books.name: BLOOD MAGICK

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: After searching for her mother, who has disappeared, for more than 10 years, a woman employs a psychic and a private detective.
books.name: LEAVING TIME

books.author: by Helen Cooper
books.description: Evie is being pursued by two men, and she doesn't know if she's falling for the right one.
books.name: ALPHA BILLIONAIRE 3

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Deborah Bladon
books.description: As the series continues, Kayla finds herself in the middle of a love triangle.
books.name: RUIN: PART 3

books.author: by Anne Rice
books.description: The Vampire Chronicles continue after a long hiatus with the reappearance of Lestat de Lioncourt.
books.name: PRINCE LESTAT

books.author: by Marie Force
books.description: Will a secretive romance evolve into something lasting?
books.name: I SAW HER STANDING THERE

books.author: by Clive Cussler
books.description: Dirk Pitt becomes involved in a post-Castro power struggle in Cuba.
books.name: HAVANA STORM

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Dognappers and a murdered reporter draw the attention of the Minnesota investigator Virgil Flowers.
books.name: DEADLINE

books.author: by Deborah Bladon
books.description: Kayla meets an unforgettable stranger on a flight to New York.
books.name: RUIN: PART 1

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman who, as a child, was spared when her mother and sisters were murdered begins to reinvestigate the case against her imprisoned brother.
books.name: DARK PLACES

books.author: by Christina Lauren
books.description: Harlow and Finn don’t like each other, which may be why their hours-old marriage was annulled.
books.name: DIRTY ROWDY THING
